casebody.data:
No. 865,

Misc.

Raubinger, Commissioner of Education of New Jersey, et al. v. Augelli, U. S. District Judge. Arthur J. Sills, Attorney General of New Jersey, Theodore I. Botter, First Assistant Attorney General, Joseph A. Hoffman, Deputy Attorney General, and Richard Newman for petitioners. Milton T. Lasher for Yolpe et al., intervenors.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of prohibition denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that the motion for leave to file should be granted.
